AT.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
AT.description: Hol dir den doppelten Spaß! Mit TAP TAP ARCADE bekommst du gleich zwei unserer beliebten Titel in einem Paket, und zwar DON'T CRASH – ein superschnelles Fahrbahnwechselspiel – und SPIKEY WALLS – unser extrem populäres „Flappy“-Spiel, bei dem man Stacheln ausweichen muss.

movies.name: TAP TAP ARCADE: Trailer zum Verkaufsstart

AU.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
AU.description: Double the Fun! In TAP TAP ARCADE you get two of our most popular titles in one convenient package. This pack includes DON'T CRASH - a quick fire change lanes driving experience, and SPIKEY WALLS - our super popular "flappy" game of avoiding spikes.

BG.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
BG.description: Double the Fun! In TAP TAP ARCADE you get two of our most popular titles in one convenient package. This pack includes DON'T CRASH - a quick fire change lanes driving experience, and SPIKEY WALLS - our super popular "flappy" game of avoiding spikes.

BE.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
BE.description: Doublez le plaisir ! Dans TAP TAP ARCADE vous recevez deux de nos titres les plus populaires dans un paquet pratique. Ce pack inclut DON'T CRASH - une expérience de conduite rapide sur les voies réservées aux pompiers, et SPIKEY WALLS - notre jeu "flappy" très populaire pour éviter les pics.

movies.name: TAP TAP ARCADE : bande-annonce de lancement

ES.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
ES.description: ¡Dobla la diversión! En TAP TAP ARCADE obtendrás dos de nuestros títulos más populares en un práctico pack. Este pack incluye DON'T CRASH, una experiencia al volante donde tendrás que cambiar de carril a gran velocidad, y SPIKEY WALLS, nuestro juego al estilo "flappy" más popular donde tendrás que sortear pinchos.

IT.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
IT.description: Raddoppia il divertimento! In TAP TAP ARCADE ottieni due dei titoli più popolari in un unico pacchetto. Questo pacchetto include DON'T CRASH - una esperienza di gioco in cui bisogna cambiare velocemente corsia, e SPIKEY WALLS - il nostro super popolare gioco in stile "flappy" in cui bisogna evitare gli spuntoni.

movies.name: TAP TAP ARCADE: trailer di lancio

NL.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
NL.description: Verdubbel het plezier! In TAP TAP ARCADE krijgt u twee van de populairste titels in een geschikt pakket. Dit pakket omvat DON'T CRASH - een snelle verandering van rij-ervaring op stroken bij brand en SPIKEY WALLS - ons super populaire "flappy"-spel waarbij nagels moeten vermeden worden.

NZ.name: TAP TAP ARCADE

PT.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
PT.description: O dobro da diversão! Em TAP TAP ARCADE você obtém dois dos nossos títulos mais populares num único pacote conveniente. Este pacote inclui DON'T CRASH — uma experiência de condução rápida entre vias, e SPIKEY WALLS — o nosso jogo "flappy" super popular de evitar picos.

movies.name: TAP TAP ARCADE: Trailer de lançamento

RU.name: TAP TAP ARCADE
RU.description: Удвой веселье! В TAP TAP ARCADE ты получаешь две игры в одном наборе. Сюда включена игра DON'T CRASH - энергичные гонки со сменой полосы, и SPIKEY WALLS - наша супер-популярная «порхающая» игра, где нужно избегать шипов.

movies.name: TAP TAP ARCADE: трейлер, посвященный выходу игры
